subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sasha Vujacic made the go-ahead 3-pointer with 28.5 seconds left, and the Los Angeles Lakers beat visiting Dallas, 101-98, last night to stop the Mavericks’ 13-game winning streak and give Coach Phil Jackson his 900th victory.
snippet: Sasha Vujacic made the go-ahead 3-pointer with 28.5 seconds left, and the Los Angeles Lakers beat visiting Dallas, 101-98, last night to stop the Mavericks’ 13-game winning streak and give Coach Phil Jackson his 900th victory.
